content.question: Imagine that you are making an oral presentation to your Japanese class. First, you will read the topic presentation. You will have 2 minutes to prepare your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as full as possible. Type your response in the target language. Present your own view or perspective on Japanese pop culture. Discuss at least FIVE aspects or examples of Japanese pop culture. Begin with an appropriate introduction, give details, explain your own view or perspective, and end with a concluding remark.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
